asChild.description:
Render as a different element type. Learn more about it at [our guide]
{@link 
https://ark-ui.com/docs/overview/as-child-prop
}

collapsible.description: Whether an accordion item can be collapsed after it has been opened.

disabled.description: Whether the accordion items are disabled

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.

multiple.description: Whether multple accordion items can be open at the same time.

onFocusChange.description: The callback fired when the focused accordion item changes.

onValueChange.description: The callback fired when the state of opened/closed accordion items changes.

orientation.description: The orientation of the accordion items.

value.description: The `id` of the accordion item that is currently being opened.
